Description:
Detects instances where an SNMP service on an OpenCanary node has had an OID request.

Author: Security Onion Solutions
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: OpenCanary - SNMP OID Request
Query: sourcetype like 'opencanary-%' eql select * from _source_ where logtype = '13001'
